ctqsf_adult_cj_1.Description: I didn't have enough to eat.

ctqsf_adult_cj_2.Description: I knew that there was someone to take care of me and protect me.

ctqsf_adult_cj_3.Description: People in my family called me things like 'stupid', 'lazy', or 'ugly'.

ctqsf_adult_cj_4.Description: My parents were too drunk or high to take care of the family.

ctqsf_adult_cj_5.Description: There was someone in my family who helped me feel important or special.

ctqsf_adult_cj_6.Description: I had to wear dirty clothes.

ctqsf_adult_cj_8.Description: I thought that my parents wished I had never been born.

ctqsf_adult_cj_9.Description: I got hit so hard by someone in my family that I had to see a doctor or go to the hospital.

ctqsf_adult_cj_10.Description: There was nothing I wanted to change about my family.

ctqsf_adult_cj_11.Description: People in my family hit me so hard it left me with bruises or marks.

ctqsf_adult_cj_12.Description: I was punished with a belt, a board, a cord (or some other hard object).

ctqsf_adult_cj_13.Description: People in my family looked out for each other.

ctqsf_adult_cj_14.Description: People in my family said hurtful or insulting things to me

ctqsf_adult_cj_15.Description: I believe that I was physically abused.

ctqsf_adult_cj_17.Description: I got hit or beaten so badly that it was noticed by someone like a teacher, neighbor, or doctor.

ctqsf_adult_cj_18.Description: I felt that someone in my family hated me.

ctqsf_adult_cj_19.Description: People in my family felt close to each other.

ctqsf_adult_cj_20.Description: Someone tried to touch me in a sexual way or tried to make me touch them.

ctqsf_adult_cj_21.Description: Someone threatened to hurt me or tell lies about me unless I did something sexual with them.

ctqsf_adult_cj_22.Description: I had the best family in the world.

ctqsf_adult_cj_23.Description: Someone tried to make me do sexual things or watch sexual things.

ctqsf_adult_cj_24.Description: Someone molested me (took advantage of me sexually).

ctqsf_adult_cj_25.Description: I believe that I was emotionally abused.

ctqsf_adult_cj_26.Description: There was someone to take me to the doctor if I needed it.

ctqsf_adult_cj_27.Description: I believe that I was sexually abused.

ctqsf_adult_cj_28.Description: My family was a source of strength and support.
